font.h1: Welcome to the TekDefense Forensic Investigator
font.p:
This Splunk app provides free tools for the forensic investigator. These tools include:
- VirusTotal Lookup
- URL Decoding
- Base64 conversion
- XOR conversion
- HEX conversion
- and more...
This app is designed to be a Splunk toolkit for the forensic investigator. Most tools do not need Internet access with the exception of a couple which use API calls.
This application does not require a TA. Just install the app and you are good to go.
